text: Chenneerkara is a village in Pathanamthitta district in the state of Kerala, India. ==Demographics== As of the 2011 India census, Chenneerkara had a population of 19124 people, with 8882 males, and 10242 females. ==Schools== *SNDP Higher Secondary School *Shalom Public School *Government ITI, Chenneerkara *Kendriya Vidyalaya Chenneerkara * Government Higher Secondary School, Thumpamon North Govt UPS Erathumpamon ==Religious Centres== *St. Mary's Catholic Church *Sree Narayana Giri Mahadeva Kshethram *St, Thomas CSI Church *Valiyatharayil Siva Kshethram *Ebenezer Mar Thoma Church ==References== Category:Villages in Pathanamthitta district
title: Chenneerkara
